Listen, guys, You might not like the messenger, but in this case at least his message is pretty much accurate.
 
 Multiculturalism is flat-out not working here, and there have been multiple explosions of race related violence like this.
There's no 'might' to it. I do not like the messenger. That fact is easily attributed to the messenger's continual message of hatred and his unrealistic dream of white supremacy. This is not a white man's world.
 
 The factual aspects of his reports are that abuses and rioting have occurred. The editorial comments are way off base.
 
 Hatred and violence from either side of a racial conflict only serve to promote the conflict and to widen the separation. The thugs, no matter their origin, were wrong. The vigilantes were wrong. Laying blame and retaliating does nothing to resolve the problem.
 
 Multiculturalism is not a flawed ideology as claimed in the first sentence of Siegy's first link. Herein lies the root problem with his sources.
 
 Peaceful coexistence and the respect of all humans is not a flawed ideology. It is simply near impossible to attain either of them over a large population.
